We can deliver your parcel within a 60km radius of Sydney within 3hrs. Simple, Fast & Reliable. Oh and yes you can book today and we'll deliver today! ;)

Sydney’s Express Courier

The courier industry has typically been terrible. Think about every courier experience you have had. You never know who is delivering your goods, or when they will be delivered. Same Day Express changes this.

When you place your booking with Same Day Express it uses the technology from Zoom2u. The booking will automatically be dispatched to the closest courier. Once your booking is linked to a courier (usually less than 5mins) you will receive a notification. You’ll receive details on who the courier is, their contact number (allowing you to call or SMS) and the ability to track their location. You will no longer need to wonder where your courier is and how long until they arrive.

Using Same Day Express will change your experience of working with a courier. We want you to have an experience that leaves you wondering why all courier companies don’t operate like this. You can book online or call us on 02 9098 5100

Fast Courier Service

We often get calls which go like this 'Can we book today and get it delivered today?' YES that's exactly what we do

Sydney Courier

We can deliver your parcel all around Sydney. We cover areas as far as Campbelltown, Parramatta, Hornsby, Northern Beaches, Eastern Suburbs and many more

Insurance

Are you used to courier companies who don't care about your goods? We care! We care so much that we self insure your goods up to the value of $300.
